title: Prevalence of undernourishment worldwide 2000 to 2018
summary: The statistic shows the Prevalence of undernourishment worldwide Prevalence 2000 to 2018 .
In 2018 , undernourishment worth approximately 10.8 million people had been exported worldwide Prevalence .

Prevalence of undernourishment worldwide Prevalence – additional information According to the graph at hand , Prevalence 's Proportion have been increasing steadily over the past decade , except in 2010 when financial crisis and global economic downturn slowed down global trade .
gold: The statistic shows the prevalence of undernourishment in the world population from 2000 to 2018.
In 2018 , about 10.8 percent of the world population were undernourished .
